unknown_responses.rationale: The segment contains the bare negation 'is not unexpected' without an explicit calming cue.

The segment states authorities believe wild birds are spreading the virus, which is not a bare negation.

The segment contains 'do not present an immediate public health concern', which is a bare negation, but it is preceded by 'The United States has the strongest AI surveillance program in the world', which is an explicit calming cue (Q5 Preparedness). Thus, it is not a bare negation *without* calming.

The segment contains 'will not enter the food system', which is a bare negation, but it is followed by 'The United States has the strongest AI surveillance program in the world', which is an explicit calming cue (Q5 Preparedness). Thus, it is not a bare negation *without* calming.
